title: Help!
description:
Carl Yard, Kate Dowden, and Brian Higgins share stories about racism in America, in vitro fertilization, and a not so holy Christian boy's camp director.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Beatles, Kevin Allison, Kate Dowden, Brian Higgins, Carl Yard, Jeff Barr, Beastie Boys, Saint Motel, Tristen)
